artist: Designer: Jack Larsen; Mill: Jack Lenor Larsen Inc.; Producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: Twill weave, vertical and horizontal stripes in different colors that emphasize the twill pattern. 2 orange warp. White, grey, tan & grey metallic weft. Color in weave form slight stripes. Stap1ed to 8.5 x11 piece of cardboard. (orange, red orange, white, grey, tan, grey metallic, beige)
